thread.title: Transgender Boy In Texas Wins State Girls Wrestling Title
thread.title_full: Transgender Boy In Texas Wins State Girls Wrestling Title

title: Transgender Boy In Texas Wins State Girls Wrestling Title
text:
Follow CBSDFW.COM: Facebook | Twitter 
(CBSDFW.COM) – Mack Beggs, a 17-year-old transgender boy, won the the Class 6-A state girls wrestling title Saturday. 
The junior from Trinity High School in Euless is transitioning from a girl to a boy and has been the center of controversy as University Interscholastic League policy states students must wrestle against the gender listed on their birth certificates. 
Mack’s family says he would rather wrestle boys. 
Mack advanced to the semi-final and state championship rounds after winning his quarterfinal match Friday. 
This is a developing story and will be updated.
